name: Extreme Luxury Desert Safari Driving - 4x4 Driver
name_original: Extreme Luxury Desert Safari Driving - 4x4 Driver
description:
Are you ready for a real adventure of 4X4 Off road Jeep desert Racing game. In this adventure game you have to show your driving skills in jeep with high speed in desert safari. 4x4 and 6x6 off-roads jeeps with a racing simulation are an off road driving experience. A free 4x4 and 6x6 jeep racing game has a variety of missions and various opponents to compete for you. In this game you have loads of other crazy racers win a battle of racing in classic mode and unlock a real challenge of checkpoints. Yes, next mission gives you a task to collect all checkpoints in a way of racer with high speed and complete all other 4x4 racing cars and monster 4wd jeep.
Let's play a racing game like real battle field and laid down other racer with your highly skilled drive. Loads of racers and limited time gives you a real feel of challenge. So face all the challenges and show your killing driving skills and win the race with maximum speed and laid down other traffic racers.

Get a real fun of off-road drive in amazing arena of desert with tons of 4x4 other jeep racers. There are off road monster jeeps in the desert so be careful with them. In the game there will other vehicles Heavy army truck, cars and off road heavy truck on the track also aware of them. Do not crash with them.
The entire environment in this game will be desert. No mountains or hilly environment. So there will be no chase or fear of fall down from the mountains or from the hills. This is complete off road jeep racing game for you. Win the first levels to unlock other jeeps and cars.
Drive your ultimate drift simulation car in Dubai airport terminal three and experience the most dangerous and thrilling stunts and drift driving situations. Drifting is not so easy in real life and not allowed on streets out there that’s why we bring the most real street drift zone in Dubai airport. Now drift and race by driving special Nissan skyline drifting car. Drive and drift your car in different situations and be a pro drifter. Enhance your driving skills in this game, challenge your friends and family and tell them to beat your drift score.
Feature of Offroad Luxury Desert Safari :-
- Smooth and realistic drift physics.
- Tilt, buttons and steering controls.
- Three different cars for drifting.
- Different Arabic songs.
- Real desert simulator.
